question: Briefly describe your company’s business model and value-chain: • Main products or services • Core value-creating activities (e.g., R&D, manufacturing, sales) • Key geographic regions • Most significant upstream suppliers and downstream customer/end-of-life stages.

citation.excerpt: The undertaking shall provide a description of its business model and its value chain, covering the main products and services, activities, markets, and value chain structure.
citation.why_relevant: The excerpt defines exactly what information must be disclosed, which the question prompts the officer to provide.

question: State your organisation’s greenhouse-gas reduction targets: • Base year and its emissions • Target year(s) and absolute reduction goals (e.g., −50 % vs. 2020) • Scopes covered (1, 2, 3) • Any intensity targets (specify the metric, e.g., t CO₂-eq / tonne product).

citation.excerpt: The undertaking shall disclose the climate-related targets it has adopted, including the base year, target year, and whether the target is absolute or intensity-based, and the scopes covered.
citation.why_relevant: Lists all data points the undertaking must report; the question gathers each of them.

question: Report your GHG emissions for the reporting year: • Scope 1 direct emissions (t CO₂-eq) • Scope 2 market-based emissions (t CO₂-eq) • Scope 2 location-based emissions (t CO₂-eq) • Scope 3 total emissions (t CO₂-eq) plus the top contributing categories.

citation.excerpt: Undertakings shall disclose greenhouse gas emissions disaggregated by scope 1, scope 2 (market-based and location-based) and scope 3, identifying the main contributing categories.
citation.why_relevant: Specifies the exact breakdown required; the question mirrors that structure.

question: Provide the unadjusted gender pay gap: • % difference between average hourly remuneration of women and men for the reporting period.

citation.excerpt: The undertaking shall disclose the unadjusted gender pay gap expressed as the percentage difference between the average hourly remuneration of women and men.
citation.why_relevant: Defines the metric to be disclosed, which the question directly requests.

question: Indicate anti-corruption and anti-bribery training coverage: • % of governing-body members trained • % of employees trained • Brief description of training content and frequency.

citation.excerpt: The undertaking shall disclose the percentage of persons within the undertaking who have received anti-corruption and anti-bribery training, including members of the administrative, management or supervisory bodies and employees.
citation.why_relevant: Specifies that percentages of trained individuals must be disclosed; the question captures those figures.
